item.title: Kafka, Avro and Schema Registry
item.description: Overview This guide is a walkthrough the different steps to have in mind when using Microcks for mocking and testing Avro encoding on top of Apache Kafka. You’ll see how Microcks can speed-up the sharing of Avro schema to consumers using a Schema Registry and we will check how Microcks can detect drifts between expected Avro format and the one really used. Starting with the 1.2.0 release of Microcks, we support Avro as an encoding format for mocking and testing asynchronous and event-driven APIs through AsyncAPI.
